name: CreatePropertyGroup
description:
Create a new property group in HubSpot CRM.

This tool creates and returns a new property group for a specified object type in HubSpot CRM. Use it when you need to organize CRM properties into groups.

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: Specifies the CRM object type for the property group (e.g., contacts, companies).

parameters.name: internal_property_group_name
parameters.description: The unique name used internally to reference the property group via the API.

value_schema.description: The internal property group name, which must be used when referencing the property group via the API.

parameters.name: property_group_label
parameters.description: A human-readable label for the property group, displayed in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: A human-readable label that will be shown in HubSpot.

parameters.name: property_group_display_order
parameters.description: Defines the display order of the property group, with lowest positive integers displayed first. Use -1 to display after positive values.

value_schema.description: Property groups are displayed in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the property group to be displayed after any positive values.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The internal property group name, which must be used when referencing the property group via the API.

value_schema.description: The internal property group name, which must be used when referencing the property group via the API.

parameters.name: displayOrder
parameters.description: Property groups are displayed in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the property group to be displayed after any positive values.

value_schema.description: Property groups are displayed in order starting with the lowest positive integer value. Values of -1 will cause the property group to be displayed after any positive values.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A human-readable label that will be shown in HubSpot.

value_schema.description: A human-readable label that will be shown in HubSpot.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
